it.polimi.se2019.model.board

Class GameField

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2019.model.board.GameField
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class GameField
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    GameField is a matrix of Platform (3x4) in which characters can move. It contains also the information about the rooms in an array.
    See Also:

    • Constructor Detail

      • GameField

        public GameField(Platform[][] field,
                 WeaponCard[] initWeapons,
                 SkullsBoard skullsBoard)
          throws InvalidFieldException,
                 InvalidRoomException,
                 InvalidAdjacentPlatformsException,
                 InvalidDeckException,
                 InvalidGenerationSpotException
        Parameters:
        initWeapons - an array of weapons ready to be grabbed, each weapon will be linked to its platform
        skullsBoard - the board that manages the killings
        field - where the 10, 11 or 12 platforms are located
        Throws:
        InvalidFieldException - if there is more than 1 platform equal to null or the matrix is not 3x4
        InvalidAdjacentPlatformsException - if the adjacency list has more than 2 nulls
        InvalidRoomException - .
        InvalidDeckException - .
        InvalidGenerationSpotException - .

    • Method Detail

      • areValidWeapons

        private boolean areValidWeapons(WeaponCard[] initWeapons)
        Returns:
        true if the array of 9 weapons is valid

      • buildPlatformAdjMap

        private void buildPlatformAdjMap(Platform platform,
                                 int row,
                                 int column)
                          throws InvalidAdjacentPlatformsException
        Parameters:
        platform - to which build the adjacency list
        row - of the current platform
        column - of the current platform
        Throws:
        InvalidAdjacentPlatformsException - is there are more than one nulls in the adjacency list build the adjacency list of each platform

      • buildRooms

        private void buildRooms()
                 throws InvalidRoomException
        it creates the array list of rooms firstly it creates the arraylists of platform having the same color, then those arraylists will be added to rooms arraylist
        Throws:
        InvalidRoomException - .

      • getAvailablePlatforms

        public java.util.List<Platform> getAvailablePlatforms(Platform initPlat,
                                                      int numOfMaxSteps)
        iterative DFS using adjacency list
        Parameters:
        initPlat - is the root of the tree
        numOfMaxSteps - permitted from initPlat, depending on the state of the player
        Returns:
        an arraylist of platforms in which the player can go from the initPlat, given the numOfMaxSteps permitted

        public java.util.List<Platform> getPlatformDir(Platform curr)
        Parameters:

        Returns:
